_sText:
This is a leap of faith map.  The basic Idea is to strafe around the map to gain mementum, and launch off the ramp into different areas of the map.

Server settings:
sv_gravity 500
sv_accelerate 25
sv_airaccellerate 1500
sv_friction 0

The map was designed completely by myself.
I got the idea for lof map from IzzehO map icey_leapoffaith.  Allcredit of concept should go to him.
